item.title: Implement Progressive Web App in Hugo using Github Actions
item.description: We all know or heard of Progressive Web Apps. I wanted to implement it because it enables web applications workable in offline, like a native app. Also it provides content faster by caching them. With help of github actions and gulp, we can easily add it to a static site deployed in Github pages.
